May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse **Source** [Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands](/Sources.aspx?ID=33) pg. 76 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- This rough metal staff is pitted and sandblasted, with thousands of nigh-imperceptible sand crystals embedded in its surface. While carrying the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) checks to identify [aberrations](/Traits.aspx?ID=1) and [oozes](/Traits.aspx?ID=122) native to the Darklands. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Staff of the Black Desert **Source** [Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands](/Sources.aspx?ID=33) pg. 76 **Price** 1,850 gp --- **Cantrip** [_know direction_](/Spells.aspx?ID=169)
**1st** [_create water_](/Spells.aspx?ID=53), [_purify food and drink_](/Spells.aspx?ID=241), [_unseen servant_](/Spells.aspx?ID=352)
**2nd** [_darkvision_](/Spells.aspx?ID=60), [_endure elements_](/Spells.aspx?ID=99)
**3rd** [_earthbind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=94), [_neutralize poison_](/Spells.aspx?ID=207), [_wanderer's guide_](/Spells.aspx?ID=368)
**4th** [_air walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=6), [_hallucinatory terrain_](/Spells.aspx?ID=145), [_rope trick_](/Spells.aspx?ID=264)
**5th** [_pillars of sand_](/Spells.aspx?ID=653), [_veil_](/Spells.aspx?ID=355) Staff of the Black Desert (Greater) **Source** [Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands](/Sources.aspx?ID=33) pg. 76 **Price** 9,500 gp --- **6th** [_purple worm sting_](/Spells.aspx?ID=242), [_summon entity_](/Spells.aspx?ID=321)
**7th** [_blightburn blast_](/Spells.aspx?ID=651), [_control sand_](/Spells.aspx?ID=652), [_unfettered pack_](/Spells.aspx?ID=350)
name: Staff of the Black Desert
